DOC.brief_summary: The aim clinical study observe therapeutic effect acupuncture intradermal acupuncture treatment insomnia Participants randomize acupuncture group control group . Both group treat 3 time week assess treatment . Hypothesis : 1 . Acupuncture group produce superior effect treatment insomnia compare control group . 2 . Acupuncture group produce superior improvement anxiety , depression , quality life , sleep log , recognition , attention , memory .
DOC.detailed_description: The acupuncture group receive acupuncture intradermal acupuncture therapy 5 acupoints wrist ankle . The control group receive treatment 5 sham point approximately 1cm lateral acupoints . Except location acupuncture point , detail treatment acupuncture group control group . A certified practitioner treat group 3 time week . The acupuncture insert skin 20 minute intradermal acupuncture insert fixed point 48~72 hour . Severity insomnia , anxiety , depression , quality life , recognition , attention , memory assess baseline , last treatment week end last treatment .
DOC.criteria: Male female age 18years 65 year . Diagnosed Insomnia use Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index ( PSQI score > 5 ) . Have problem communication ( example , reading , write , listen , speak ) . Provided write informed consent . Regular medication , Herbal medication health functional food treat insomnia Presence major neuropsychiatric disorder ( example , mental retardation , psychosis severe mood disorder ) Presence inflammatory skin disease acupuncture site Presence bleeding disorder take anticoagulant Presence severe physical disease may preclude safe use acupuncture Enrolled another clinical study past 1 month Pregnancy breast feeding
